relationships.description: Long-term supporter relationship spanning 16 years with significant life impact
GM provided career advice that negatively impacted sender's life

analysis.purpose: To request help from Jeffrey Epstein regarding media/press harassment and to express grievances about how the relationship has negatively impacted the sender's life
analysis.significance: Reveals a long-term relationship with Epstein that has caused significant personal and professional harm to the sender, with current media attention causing distress

notable_quotes: I dropped out of college because of you (and GM's) advice. Started working for a company you wanted me to and basically my life has become hell since then.
I have been your supporter for 16 years, the media explosion with Clinton, Trump and Cosby is affecting me. I'm not prepared for this.
I can not have press, media, private investigators, film companies, etc. contacting me or my parents and sisters at home or on cell/texts and or by mail.
red_flags: Long-term relationship with Epstein causing significant negative life consequences
Sender feels trapped and unable to escape association
Career and life decisions influenced by Epstein with damaging results
Media attention causing personal distress and family harassment

evidence: Implied pressure on Epstein to provide assistance due to past relationship
Reference to damaging information about their association
Sense of obligation created by long-term support
blackmail_indicators.description: While not explicit blackmail, the email creates pressure on Epstein by highlighting how his past actions have damaged the sender's life and how current media attention is causing further harm, implying he has responsibility to help

illegal_activity.description: No direct illegal activity discussed - this is a personal complaint and request for help regarding media attention

details: Press, media, private investigators, film companies contacting sender and family
Media explosion with Clinton, Trump and Cosby affecting sender

public_knowledge.context: This appears to be a private communication revealing personal distress caused by association with Jeffrey Epstein during the 2016 election cycle when Epstein's connections to prominent figures were becoming public knowledge

analysis.summary: An individual who has been associated with Jeffrey Epstein for 16 years writes a desperate email requesting help with media harassment, blaming Epstein for negative life consequences including dropping out of college and career problems, and expressing distress over media attention linking them to Epstein during the Clinton-Trump election cycle.
